ai-patthana16.44:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.44:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of himself.
ai-patthana16.44:1.1_0: for the sake of this teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of a condition.
ai-patthana16.44:1.1_1: for the sake of another, not for the sake of an investigating, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.44:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana16.44:2.1_0: Doesn’t give rise to satisfaction for the sake of himself.
ai-patthana16.44:2.1_1: Not for the sake of another, not for the sake of an external cause,
ai-patthana16.44:2.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
